title: Unordered and ordered pairs - extension for unordered pairs

blocks.name: elprneb
blocks.content: An element of a proper unordered pair is the first element iff it is not the second element. (Contributed by AV, 18-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm elprneb(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cpr(c1, c2)), wne(c1, c2)), wb(wceq(c0, c1), wne(c0, c2)))
} = {
  imp(wcel(c0, cpr(c1, c2)), wne(c1, c2), wb(wceq(c0, c1), wne(c0, c2)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cpr(c1, c2)), wi(wne(c1, c2), wb(wceq(c0, c1), wne(c0, c2))), wo(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c0, c2)))
  elpri(c0, c1, c2)
  jaoi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c0, c2), wi(wne(c1, c2), wb(wceq(c0, c1), wne(c0, c2))))
  sylbid(wceq(c0, c1), wne(c1, c2), wb(wceq(c0, c1), wne(c0, c2)), wne(c0, c2))
  eqcoms(c0, c1, wb(wne(c1, c2), wne(c0, c2)))
  neeq1(c1, c0, c2)
  ex(wceq(c0, c1), wne(c0, c2), wb(wceq(c0, c1), wne(c0, c2)))
  pm5.1(wceq(c0, c1), wne(c0, c2))
  sylbird(wceq(c0, c2), wne(c1, c2), wb(wceq(c0, c1), wne(c0, c2)), wne(c1, c0))
  neeq2(c0, c2, c1)
  ex(wceq(c0, c2), wne(c1, c0), wb(wceq(c0, c1), wne(c0, c2)))
  necon2abid(c0, c2, wa(wceq(c0, c2), wne(c1, c0)), wceq(c0, c1))
  sylan2b(wceq(c0, c2), wne(c1, c0), wb(wceq(c0, c2), wn(wceq(c0, c1))), wn(wceq(c0, c1)))
  nesym(c1, c0)
  pm5.1(wceq(c0, c2), wn(wceq(c0, c1)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elprneb(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ { c1, c2 } ∧ c1 ≠ c2)→(c0 = c1 ↔ c0 ≠ c2))
} = {
  imp(c0 ∈ { c1, c2 }, c1 ≠ c2, (c0 = c1 ↔ c0 ≠ c2))
  syl(c0 ∈ { c1, c2 }, (c1 ≠ c2 →(c0 = c1 ↔ c0 ≠ c2)), (c0 = c1 ∨ c0 = c2))
  elpri(c0, c1, c2)
  jaoi(c0 = c1, c0 = c2, (c1 ≠ c2 →(c0 = c1 ↔ c0 ≠ c2)))
  sylbid(c0 = c1, c1 ≠ c2, (c0 = c1 ↔ c0 ≠ c2), c0 ≠ c2)
  eqcoms(c0, c1, (c1 ≠ c2 ↔ c0 ≠ c2))
  neeq1(c1, c0, c2)
  ex(c0 = c1, c0 ≠ c2, (c0 = c1 ↔ c0 ≠ c2))
  pm5.1(c0 = c1, c0 ≠ c2)
  sylbird(c0 = c2, c1 ≠ c2, (c0 = c1 ↔ c0 ≠ c2), c1 ≠ c0)
  neeq2(c0, c2, c1)
  ex(c0 = c2, c1 ≠ c0, (c0 = c1 ↔ c0 ≠ c2))
  necon2abid(c0, c2, (c0 = c2 ∧ c1 ≠ c0), c0 = c1)
  sylan2b(c0 = c2, c1 ≠ c0, (c0 = c2 ↔ ¬ c0 = c1), ¬ c0 = c1)
  nesym(c1, c0)
  pm5.1(c0 = c2, ¬ c0 = c1)
}
